name: BackGammon Pygame
description:
Introduction?

Hello my name is Reuvi Israeli I am in highschool and this is my second game on my game dev journey. I am working on learning how to use pygame, aswell as unity in the future. This is my first stepping stone into this field, and without further a do let me introduce my backgammon mock!

What Is Backgammon?

Backgammon - "a board game in which two players move their pieces around twenty-four triangular points according to the throw of dice, the winner being the first to remove all their pieces from the board." - Google

Features?
  •    Local Two Player
  •    Future Multiplayer Functionality to be added
  •    Classic Black and White backgammon pieces
  •    Turn based strategy
  •    Predictable Movements
  •    Simulated Dice
  •    Auto Jail System
Use?

Its free! No need for donations, but I would appreciate support in the comments below. Enjoy the game and have fun with your friends. Peace.
